Examples
========

We have examples that demonstrate the use of :class:`~pyampute.ampute.MultivariateAmputation`, how to design an experiment to evaluate the effect of missing values on your model and an example that further explains the use of a custom ``score_to_probability_func``.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   auto_examples/plot_easy_example
   auto_examples/plot_simulation_pipeline
   auto_examples/plot_custom_pipeline
   auto_examples/plot_custom_probability_function
